name: Hexa Turn
description: Hexa Turn is a turn-based puzzle game with minimalist design. The logic is simple: block the triange. So, think outside of the box and try not to find a solution. Try to break the solution!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: Any Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
